text: Avangardnoye () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Kutuzovskoye Rural Settlement of Guryevsky District, Kaliningrad Oblast, Russia. The population was 159 as of 2010. There are 18 streets.Карта поселка Авангардное в Калининградской области == References == Category:Rural localities in Kaliningrad Oblast
title: Avangardnoye
